short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create high-fidelity web archives directly in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When enabled, ArchiveWeb.page will record the network traffic on a given tab and stores the data in the browser for later viewing.

Archives created with ArchiveWeb.page can be viewed from right within the app, or using Webrecorder's free ReplayWeb.page viewer. Files can be exported in standard WARC and WACZ formats.
